comment: intenstive pure islay aroma with little hint of sweetnes , bold warm

The heavy peat attacks you straight and leave you with a rich malt flavours.
Heavy peated one

Quick hit #3: My 2nd favorite on the night. Nice full on peat..no lemony, acidic profile just good old fashion peat. I forgot to take time to analyze where it could come from. Not a CI, Ard, Laph, Ledaig. Maybe a lagavullin or bowmore?
Finom, olajos, rafinalt. pikans fust utoizzel. Hits all the senses
obviously a Smokey smell. you get a wonderful sweet BBQ taste. this is a good find.
fantastic finish, less sweet than orig smokehead but amazing initial nose and finish that lasts a good while
Nice full smoke, good price range.
Super peated, volle maar niet te sterke whisky. (ondanks 58%) lange afdronk. top whisky
